headline.main: Lessons Learned, Mental Toughness Key for All Blacks
headline.print_headline: Lessons Learned, Mental Toughness Key for All Blacks

docs.snippet: Lessons from previous World Cup campaigns have been applied by New Zealand as they head to England as champions, though under less pressure than they were four years ago when they managed to end a 24-year title drought....
docs.lead_paragraph: Lessons from previous World Cup campaigns have been applied by New Zealand as they head to England as champions, though under less pressure than they were four years ago when they managed to end a 24-year title drought.

headline.main: Entangled Blue Whale Spotted Off Southern California Coast
headline.print_headline: Entangled Blue Whale Spotted Off Southern California Coast

docs.snippet: A blue whale entangled in a fishing line was spotted off the coast of southern California on Friday and rescue workers were determining how to free the massive mammal, officials said....
docs.lead_paragraph: A blue whale entangled in a fishing line was spotted off the coast of southern California on Friday and rescue workers were determining how to free the massive mammal, officials said.

headline.main: Judge Blocks Festival From Showing Aretha Franklin Concert Movie
headline.print_headline: Judge Blocks Festival From Showing Aretha Franklin Concert Movie

docs.snippet: Singer Aretha Franklin on Friday won a court order blocking the Telluride Film Festival from screening "Amazing Grace," a film based predominantly on footage from her 1972 concert at a Los Angeles church....
docs.lead_paragraph: Singer Aretha Franklin on Friday won a court order blocking the Telluride Film Festival from screening "Amazing Grace," a film based predominantly on footage from her 1972 concert at a Los Angeles church.

headline.main: Davis Hits 2 HRs, Orioles Beat Jays 10-2
headline.print_headline: Davis Hits 2 HRs, Orioles Beat Jays 10-2

docs.snippet: Chris Davis hit two home runs to take the major league lead with 40, Matt Wieters and Adam Jones both connected and the Baltimore Orioles beat the Toronto Blue Jays 10-2 on Friday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Chris Davis hit two home runs to take the major league lead with 40, Matt Wieters and Adam Jones both connected and the Baltimore Orioles beat the Toronto Blue Jays 10-2 on Friday night.

docs.snippet: Gird your loins: It’s a Byron Walden Saturday....

headline.main: Altidore Scores Twice as US Rallies to Beat Peru 2-1
headline.print_headline: Altidore Scores Twice as US Rallies to Beat Peru 2-1

docs.snippet: Jozy Altidore insists he has not recovered completely from an injury filled summer, a promising thought given his latest performance....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jozy Altidore insists he has not recovered completely from an injury filled summer, a promising thought given his latest performance.

headline.main: Josh Tomlin Throws a Four-Hitter and Indians Beat Tigers 8-1
headline.print_headline: Josh Tomlin Throws a Four-Hitter and Indians Beat Tigers 8-1

docs.snippet: Jerry Sands homered, tripled and scored twice and Josh Tomlin pitched a four-hitter as the Cleveland Indians beat the Detroit Tigers 8-1 Friday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jerry Sands homered, tripled and scored twice and Josh Tomlin pitched a four-hitter as the Cleveland Indians beat the Detroit Tigers 8-1 Friday night.

headline.main: Rookie Severino Wins Again, Yankees Hit 3 HRs to Beat Rays
headline.print_headline: Rookie Severino Wins Again, Yankees Hit 3 HRs to Beat Rays

docs.snippet: Sizzling rookie Luis Severino won his third straight start and Alex Rodriguez hit his 681st career home run, sending the New York Yankees over the Tampa Bay Rays 5-2 on Friday night for their sixth win in seven games....
docs.lead_paragraph: Sizzling rookie Luis Severino won his third straight start and Alex Rodriguez hit his 681st career home run, sending the New York Yankees over the Tampa Bay Rays 5-2 on Friday night for their sixth win in seven games.

headline.main: San Diego Firm Recalls Cucumbers After Salmonella Outbreak
headline.print_headline: San Diego Firm Recalls Cucumbers After Salmonella Outbreak

docs.snippet: A California company is recalling its cucumbers after a salmonella outbreak that has sickened 285 people in 27 states and killed a San Diego woman....
docs.lead_paragraph: A California company is recalling its cucumbers after a salmonella outbreak that has sickened 285 people in 27 states and killed a San Diego woman.

headline.main: Brazil hostage shootout caught on camera
headline.sub: Brazil hostage shootout caught on camera

docs.snippet: Two men die in a shootout outside Sao Paulo's central Cathedral after a woman was taken hostage for over an hour. Gavino Garay reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Two men die in a shootout outside Sao Paulo's central Cathedral after a woman was taken hostage for over an hour. Gavino Garay reports.
